content:
I've revised your schedule to include 30 minutes of guitar practice every weekday evening:

**Monday**

* 6:00 pm - 7:30 pm: Workout (1.5 hours)
* 8:00 pm - 8:30 pm: Guitar practice (30 minutes)
* 8:30 pm - 9:00 pm: Reading (30 minutes)
* Rest of the evening: Free time

**Tuesday**

* 6:30 pm - 8:30 pm: Language exchange program
* 9:00 pm - 9:30 pm: Guitar practice (30 minutes)
* 9:30 pm - 10:00 pm: Reading (30 minutes)
* Rest of the evening: Free time

**Wednesday**

* 6:00 pm - 7:30 pm: Workout (1.5 hours)
* 8:00 pm - 8:30 pm: Guitar practice (30 minutes)
* 8:30 pm - 9:00 pm: Reading (30 minutes)
* Rest of the evening: Free time

**Thursday**

* 6:30 pm - 8:30 pm: Language exchange program
* 9:00 pm - 9:30 pm: Guitar practice (30 minutes)
* 9:30 pm - 10:00 pm: Reading (30 minutes)
* Rest of the evening: Free time

**Friday**

* 6:00 pm - 7:30 pm: Workout (1.5 hours)
* 8:00 pm - 8:30 pm: Guitar practice (30 minutes)
* 8:30 pm - 9:00 pm: Reading (30 minutes)
* Rest of the evening: Free time

**Weekends**

* You can use this time to relax, catch up on other activities, or fit in additional guitar practice if you prefer.

By incorporating 30 minutes of guitar practice into your weekday evenings, you'll be able to make progress on your goal of learning to play the guitar. Remember to be patient with yourself and enjoy the process of learning.

As before, feel free to adjust this revised schedule as needed to fit your other activities and commitments. Don't hesitate to reach out if you need further changes or have any questions!
